John 1:1 (English Standard Version)

John 1

The Word Became Flesh
 1(A) In the beginning was(B) the Word, and(C) the Word was with God, and(D) the Word was God.

Cross references:
  1. John 1:1 : Gen 1:1; Col 1:17; 1 John 1:1; Rev 1:4, 8, 17; 3:14; 21:6; 22:13
  2. John 1:1 : Rev 19:13; Heb 4:12; 1 John 1:1
  3. John 1:1 : 1 John 1:2; John 17:5
  4. John 1:1 : Phil 2:6
English Standard Version (ESV)
